body:
I thought I would make a guide for people participating in any tournament related events. (Can we get a sticky?)

[Chollonge Bracket]
  • http://avicus.challonge.com/toc
--------------------------------------------------
[Media/Livestream]
  • https://avicus.net/forums/da99f526f (Courtesy of infractions)
--------------------------------------------------
[Tournament Lobby]
1. Connect to avic.us
2. Type /server TM 
3. You can chat with those competing but, you are restricted from watching the match live. Media will be available.
--------------------------------------------------
[Day 1 Recap] Map: Sunbeam Temple

(B) Cacalmarin vs. Coffee [2-0] (Default Win) 

(D) Team Allah vs. Kyudo [1-2]

(B) Fortissimus vs. Apollo [1-2]

(C) PureBlox vs. Bad Company [1-2]

(A) Insidia vs. Emancipators [2-0] (Default win)

(C) Citsitua vs. FaZe [2-0] (Default win)

(D) TheCrazyBeaners vs. Berzerk V2 [2-0] (Default win)

(A) Peruan Combo vs. Impact [0-2]
--------------------------------------------------
[Day 2 Recap] Map: Rendezvous 3.5 TM
  • Emancipators disbanded leaving Group A with 3 teams: Impact, Peruan Combo, and Insidia. 
  • Coffee has been disqualified leaving Group B with 3 teams: Apollo, Cacalmarin, and Fortissimus.
  • FaZe has been disqualified leaving Group C with 3 teams: Bad Company, PureBlox, and Citsitua. 
  • Cacalmarin vs. Fortissimus match ends in a draw.
(A) Impact vs. Emancipators [2-0] (Default win) 

(D) Team Allah vs. Berzerk V2 [1-2]

(D) Kyudo vs. TheCrazyBeaners [1-2]

(B) Apollo vs. Coffee [0-0] (Default win) 

(B) Cacalmarin vs. Fortissimus [1-1] (Draw)

(C) Citsitua vs. Bad Company [0-2] (Default win) 

(A) Insidia vs. Peruan Combo [0-1]

(C) PureBlox vs. FaZe [2-0] (Default win)


More games pending! Mod+ please help me edit the post if you have the correct information.
*Underlined names are the winners of the match.

replies.body: Huge letdown by Team Allah in this tournament :/ Also,how many times does each team play each other?
replies.body_tagged: Huge letdown by Team Allah in this tournament :/ Also,how many times does each team play each other?

replies.body:
Each team plays the other 3 teams in their group once. Then the top 2 teams in each group move on to a single elimination bracket.

Edit: To be fair, Team Allah has a pretty tough group with Kyudo and TCB.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Allah ended up with one of the toughest groups to compete in and i don't see you in the tournament, you have no right to call them let downs.
replies.body_tagged: Allah ended up with one of the toughest groups to compete in and i don't see you in the tournament, you have no right to call them let downs.

replies.body: I know I just thought they would have topped the group and went to knockout.I mean they did have a tough group and did play well I just thought they would have played better.Also Team Allah is good and I'm not calling them let downs so let me reword it.I thought team Allah is a great team so the results of the matches were shocking even though they had a tough group and that's why I thought the word letdown was appropriate.
